Class VoiceRecognitionManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • cosc345.app.model.VoiceRecognitionManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    edu.cmu.pocketsphinx.RecognitionListener

    public class VoiceRecognitionManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements edu.cmu.pocketsphinx.RecognitionListener
    Manages voice recognition and voice control.

      • registerAction

        public void registerAction(MenuAction action)
        Register an action to be made available in the voice recognition menu. Note: Make sure the string used for the action's activation is in the mymenu.gram file inside the assets folder, otherwise it will not work.
        Parameters:
        action - The menu action to register.

      • pause

        public void pause()
        Cancel any voice recognition activity and pause the voice recognition service.
